Board.name: readingh
Board.author: Bruno Coudoin (bruno.coudoin@gcompris.net)
Board.title: Horizontal reading practice
Board.description: Read a list of words and work out if a given word is in it
Board.goal: Reading training in a limited time
Board.manual: A word is shown at the top right of the board. A list of words will appear and disappear on the left. Does the given word belong to the list?
